definitions.body: tracts of land, used for the pasturage of flocks and herds, [[דָּֽשְׁאוּ נְאוֹת מִדְבָּר]] the pastures of the wilderness put forth green grass Joe 2:22; ´[[מ]] ´[[יִרְעֲפוּ נ]] the pastures of the wilderness drop (fertility) Ps 65:13; ´[[מ]] ´[[יׇֽבְשׁוּ נ]] are dried up Je 23:10, cf. Je 9:9, Joe 1:19, Joe 1:20.

uninhabited land, [[מִדְבָּר לאׁ־אָדָם בּוֹ]] wilderness in which is no man Job 38:26; the abode of pelicans Ps 102:7; wild asses Job 24:5, Je 2:24; jackals Mal 1:3; ostriches La 4:3; [[מִי־יִנֵנִי בַמִּדְבָּר מְלוֹן]] [[אׂרְחִים וְאֶֽעֶזְבָה אֶת־עַמִּי]] O that I had in the wilderness a lodging place of wayfarers, that I might leave my people Je 9:1; [[טוֹב שֶׁבֶת בְּאֶרֶץ מִדְבָּר]] better to dwell in a desert land, than with a contentious woman Pr 21:19; [[בְּאֶרֶץ מִדְבָּר וּבְתׂהוּ יְלֵל יְשִׁמׂן]] in a desert land, and in a waste howling wilderness De 32:10.

large tracts of such land bearing various names, in certain districts of which there might be towns and cities: [[יִשְׂאוּ]] [[מִדְבָּר וְעָרָיו חֲחֵרִים תֵּשֵׁב קֵדָר]] let the wilderness and its cities lift up (their voice), the villages that Kedar doth inhabit Is 42:11. There were six cities in the wilderness of Judah Jos 15:61, Jos 15:62; [[הַמִּדְבָּר]] usually = wilderness of the wanderings Ge 14:6, Nu 14:16, Nu 14:29, Nu 14:32, Nu 14:33, Nu 14:33 +, or the great Arabian desert Ju Jdg 11:22 +; but may also refer to any other Ct So 3:6, So 8:5. Special tracts—(a) of the wilderness of the wandering were [[שׁוּר]] ´[[מ]] Ex 15:22, [[סין]]Ex 16:1 +, [[סיני]] Ex 19:1 +, [[פארן]] Nu 13:26 +, [[חן]] Nu 20:1 +, [[קדשׁ]] Ps 29:8, [[אתם]] Nu 33:8; (b) in W. Pal. [[יהודה]] ´[[מ]] Ju Jdg 1:16, Ps 63:1 cf. Jos 15:61, [[מעוֹן]] 1Sa 23:24, 1Sa 23:25, [[זיף]] 1Sa 23:15, 1Sa 26:2, [[באר שׁבע]] Ge 21:14, [[עין גדי]] 1Sa 24:2, [[תקוע]] 2Ch 20:20, [[ירואל]] 2Ch 20:16, [[גבעון]] 2Sa 2:24; (c) in East. Palestine [[מואב]] De 2:8, [[אדום]] 2Ki 3:8, [[קדמות]] De 2:26.

fig. [[וְשַׂמְתִּיהָ כַמִּדְבָּר וְשַׁתִּהָ כְּאֶרֶץ]] [[חִיׇּה]] and (lest I) make her as a wilderness and set her like a dry land Ho 2:5; [[הֲמִדְבָּר הָיִיתִי לְיִשְׂרָאֵל]] have I been a wilderness to Israel ? Je 2:31.
